item.title: Balveda
item.description: Juboal-Rabaroansa Perosteck Alseyn Balveda dam T’seif, usually referred to as Perosteck Balveda, is an operative of the Culture assigned to track and apprehend Bora Horza Gobuchul. She works for the Special Circumstances branch of Contact, and despite being ambivalent about the methods they use, deeply believes in their objectives.
